definitions.definition: A competitor (person, team, company, etc.) with the same goal as another, or striving to attain the same thing. Defeating a rival may be a primary or necessary goal of a competitor.
definitions.example: Chris is my biggest rival in the 400-metre race.

definitions.definition: Someone or something with similar claims of quality or distinction as another.
definitions.example: As a social historian, he has no rival.

definitions.definition: One having a common right or privilege with another; a partner.
To be equal to, or match, or to surpass another.
To strive to equal or excel; to emulate.
Having the same pretensions or claims; standing in competition for superiority.
definitions.example: rival lovers; rival claims or pretensions
